thread.title: BRIEF-Resilient REIT Opens Talks With Lenders To Siyakha Education Trusts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Resilient REIT Opens Talks With Lenders To Siyakha Education Trusts
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - RESILIENT REIT LTD:
* ‍PRUDENT TO COMMENCE NEGOTIATIONS WITH TRUSTEES OF AND OTHER LENDERS TO SIYAKHA EDUCATION TRUSTS REGARDING ALL LOANS TO TRUSTS, UNDERLYING COLLATERAL​
* ‍TO COMMENCE NEGOTIATIONS WITH TRUSTEES OF AND OTHER LENDERS TO SIYAKHA EDUCATION TRUSTS REGARDING ALL LOANS TO TRUSTS AND UNDERLYING COLLATERAL​
* ‍UNABLE TO CONTROL ALL PARTICIPANTS IN NEGOTIATIONS REGARDING CONFIDENTIALITY. OUTCOME OF NEGOTIATIONS MAY IMPACT CO‘S DISTRIBUTABLE EARNINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
